#summary Online Appendix for WSD Paper

= Introduction =
This page provides links to the supplementary data for our paper: Garla V, Brandt C, Knowledge-based biomedical word sense disambiguation: an evaluation and application to clinical document classification (submitted)

= Semantic Similarity Measures =
Refer to [http://ytex.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/projects/nlm.wsd/doc/YTEX%20Semantic%20Similarity%20Measures.pdf YTEX Semantic Similarity Measures] for a description of the measures used in this study.  Note that the 'Intrinsic Path' similarity measure is another name for 'Jiang & Conrath'.

= Reproducing our results on WSD datasets =
Refer to the [WordSenseDisambiguation_V08 Word Sense Disambiguation Wiki Page] for a detailed description of how to reproduce our results.

= Reproducing our results on CMC 2007 challenge =
Refer to the [WordSenseDisambiguation_V08#Reproducing_results_on_CMC_2007_challenge CMC section of the WSD Wiki Page] for a detailed description of how to reproduce our results.

= Supplementary data =
The [http://ytex.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/projects/nlm.wsd/doc/results.xlsx results.xlsx] file contains the following worksheets:
  * all-wsd-results: WSD accuracy for each dataset and parameter combination
  * nlm-model: coefficients & p-values for their significance for the model of WSD accuracy as a linear function of parameters on the NLM WSD dataset
  * msh-model: coefficients & p-values for their significance for the model of WSD accuracy as a linear function of parameters on the MSH WSD dataset
Other worksheets correspond to tables/figures in the main paper.
